title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 464.1 - Rendition, content and revision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 464.1 - Rendition, content and revision

State Regulations
(a) The board shall render its decision in
writing promptly. Where the decision is not unanimous, the majority shall
control. The board may affirm or reverse, wholly or in part, or may modify the
appealed decision or may make such order, decision or determination as may be
necessary. The decision shall contain a statement of the issues, the findings
of fact, the conclusions and the reasons therefor. (b) On its own motion or on application duly
made to it, the board may revise or resettle its order, decision or
determination as it deems necessary. (c) The decision of the board shall be
accompanied by a notice of the right to appeal therefrom to the Appellate

Division of the Supreme Court, Third Department, pursuant to section 624 of the
law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
464.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
